query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS leadActivities (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  leadId INT NOT NULL,
  activityType ENUM('email-sent', 'email-opened', 'email-clicked', 'call-attempted', 'call-connected', 'demo-scheduled', 'whitepaper-downloaded', 'calculator-used', 'page-visited') NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  metadata JSON,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 385B8cqVvDyKYq8.2ff4d9bc4b3d --database HoXBpYBQ3qbVm6g7qLEzMx --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS leadActivities (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  leadId INT NOT NULL,
  activityType ENUM('email-sent', 'email-opened', 'email-clicked', 'call-attempted', 'call-connected', 'demo-scheduled', 'whitepaper-downloaded', 'calculator-used', 'page-visited') NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  metadata JSON,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
